part_description: Three socket openings arranged horizontally with switch cutouts above.
internal_interaction_description: The socket openings are aligned to accommodate electrical plugs, while the switch cutouts allow toggling of connected circuits. The parts are integrated into a single cover plate, ensuring a compact and functional design for electrical safety and convenience.
external_interaction_description: The outlet cover interfaces with electrical plugs and switches, providing a safe barrier to prevent accidental contact with live wires. It is typically mounted on a wall, allowing users to connect devices and control electrical flow through the switches.
